page.title: 15Kennel Farm.
page.content: Kennel Farm was built in 1927. It is owned by Beds. County Council. The farm was originally used to house the dogs used in hunts, but now it grows cereals, some cabbages and sprouts. Mr and Mrs Boddington live on the 120 acre farm. The fields range in size from 6 to 30 acres. They own 3 tractors, 1 combine harvester, 1 fork lift truck and a plough. They are kept in one of the storage barns on the farm. The other barn is used to store harvested crops. There is some woodland near the farm but the surrounding land is mainly agricultural land.
